Grand City School District – District Report Card


VISION STATEMENT

Grand City School District will be recognized as a leading, innovative educational system that provides learning opportunities for all students to gain the knowledge and skills necessary to be productive global citizens and successful lifelong learners. The diverse educators and staff in the Grand City School District will continuously and collaboratively improve their practice, contributing to each school’s growth as a center of excellence.

Goals

  1. rovide a safe and secure school environment
  2. Use a variety of assessments and interventions to support students, evaluate progress, and ensure accountability for student achievement
  3. Integrate technology into the curriculum to increase achievement of all students
  4. Collaborate in Professional Learning Communities (PLCs) to promote student learning
